name: Auckland Harbor Cafe
description: Premium waterfront dining experience in the heart of Auckland.

name: Wellington Tech Solutions
description: Expert IT support and software development for local businesses.

name: Christchurch Builders Ltd
description: Reliable residential and commercial construction services.

name: Queenstown Adventures
description: Unforgettable outdoor experiences and guided tours.

name: Hamilton Electric
description: 24/7 electrical services for home and business.

name: Eden Noodles Cafe
description: Eden Noodles is a Dominion Road institution beloved for its authentic hand-pulled Sichuan noodles, famous dan dan dumplings in addictive chilli oil, and customizable spice levels that cater to everyone from mild-seekers to hardcore spice enthusiasts. With multiple Auckland locations, it has become the city's benchmark for affordable, no-frills Sichuan cuisine — the kind of place where the queue out the door is the best review you'll ever read.
highlights: Auckland's most beloved Sichuan noodle restaurant
Famous hand-pulled dan dan noodles and chilli oil dumplings
Customizable spice levels from mild to extreme
Multiple Auckland locations for convenience
Exceptional value with generous portions

name: Grand Harbour
description: Grand Harbour has been Auckland's definitive yum cha destination for over two decades, drawing weekend crowds from across the city to its harbourside Viaduct location. With over 80 dim sum varieties, traditional trolley service, live seafood tanks, and authentic Hong Kong-style Cantonese cooking, it delivers the full yum cha experience — from silky har gow to crisp BBQ pork buns and delicate turnip cake. A true Auckland dining institution.
address: Cnr Pakenham St & Viaduct Harbour Ave, Auckland
highlights: Auckland's premier yum cha destination for over 20 years
Over 80 dim sum varieties with traditional trolley service
Stunning Viaduct Harbour waterfront location
Live seafood tanks for the freshest Cantonese dishes
Weekend institution — arrive before 11am to beat the queue

name: Huami
description: Huami at SkyCity is Auckland's most sophisticated Chinese fine dining experience, seamlessly bridging Cantonese tradition with contemporary innovation. The restaurant is renowned for its fruit-wood roasted Peking Duck — carved tableside with precision — truffle prawn dumplings during yum cha service, and a stunning interior featuring a dramatic open kitchen and custom Chinese artworks. Ideal for business entertaining or special celebrations.
highlights: Auckland's premier Chinese fine dining at SkyCity
Signature fruit-wood roasted Peking Duck carved tableside
Premium yum cha with truffle prawn dumplings
Stunning interior with dramatic open kitchen
Extensive wine, cocktail, and sake list

name: Ghost Street
description: Ghost Street is a dark, moody underground gem in Britomart that channels the energy of Beijing's famed Gui Jie (Ghost Street) night market. Specialising in Western Chinese and Xi'an-inspired street food, the kitchen turns out incredible cumin-crusted lamb ribs, hand-pulled biang biang noodles, and skewers seasoned with chilli and Sichuan pepper. The atmosphere — low lighting, communal tables, and a buzzing late-night crowd — is unlike any other Chinese restaurant in Auckland.
highlights: Unique underground atmosphere inspired by Beijing's Ghost Street
Xi'an-style cumin lamb ribs and biang biang noodles
Open late — perfect for post-show or late-night dining
Communal dining ideal for sharing multiple dishes
One of Auckland's most distinctive Chinese dining experiences

name: Empress Garden
description: Empress Garden is a Herne Bay institution that has served Auckland's finest Cantonese cuisine for decades. Renowned for what many consider the best Peking Duck in Auckland — crisp-skinned and carved tableside with traditional accompaniments — and exemplary service that sets it apart from the crowd. The elegant setting and consistently outstanding Cantonese cooking make it a favourite for family celebrations and intimate dinner parties.
highlights: Widely regarded as Auckland's best Peking Duck
Decades-long Herne Bay institution with loyal following
Elegant setting perfect for celebrations and banquets
Exemplary service and attention to detail
Traditional Cantonese cooking with consistent quality

name: MASU by Nic Watt
description: Award-winning robata-style Japanese dining in the heart of Auckland's Federal Street precinct. Executive Chef Nic Watt's signature SkyCity restaurant is celebrated for its contemporary take on traditional open-charcoal Binchotan cooking, with a menu that champions New Zealand's finest seasonal ingredients alongside premium Japanese imports like A5 Wagyu.
highlights: Auckland's premier robata grill experience over Binchotan charcoal
Award-winning chef Nic Watt's flagship restaurant
Extensive premium sake and Japanese whisky list
Spacious, architecturally stunning dining room
Locally sourced sushi bar with daily fresh catches

name: Cocoro
description: Cocoro, meaning 'heart and soul' in Japanese, is Ponsonby's most celebrated Japanese restaurant. Renowned for its artful multi-course degustation menus and the iconic Signature Sashimi Platter featuring 25+ varieties of pristine New Zealand seafood, it offers an intimate, chef-driven experience that is considered Auckland's closest equivalent to a Tokyo omakase counter.
highlights: Auckland's premier omakase and degustation destination
Iconic 25+ variety Signature Sashimi Platter
Intimate Ponsonby setting with counter seating available
Extensive curated sake and Japanese beverage list
Multiple award-winning culinary team

name: Ebisu
description: Located in the heart of Britomart's waterfront precinct, Ebisu delivers modern Japanese dining in a sleek, industrial-chic space. The kitchen blends traditional Japanese techniques with contemporary European influences, featuring locally sourced seafood, premium A5 wagyu, and innovative sushi rolls — including the famous Rainbow Roll — in a sophisticated yet relaxed setting.
highlights: Prime Britomart waterfront location
Seven-course tasting menu and à la carte options
Famous for their inventive Rainbow Roll
Premium Wagyu and seasonal seafood specials
Stylish industrial-chic interiors perfect for events

name: Azabu
description: Azabu is Auckland's pioneer of Nikkei cuisine — the vibrant fusion of Japanese precision and Peruvian bold flavours born from Japanese migration to South America. Set across two locations in Ponsonby and Mission Bay, the restaurant offers an electric atmosphere, creative cocktails from the hidden sake bar, and dishes like new-style sashimi, golden gyoza, and robata-grilled meats that defy convention.
highlights: Auckland's most celebrated Nikkei (Japanese-Peruvian) restaurant
Hidden sake and cocktail bar downstairs
Two Auckland locations: Ponsonby and Mission Bay
Innovative new-style sashimi and golden gyoza
Vibrant atmosphere ideal for group dining and celebrations

name: Tanuki's Cave
description: An underground izakaya institution that has been a Queen Street landmark since 1994. Descend the staircase into a smoky, atmospheric cave where the yakitori grill sizzles with skewers, kushiage baskets emerge golden from the fryer, and a vast selection of premium sake and Japanese whisky flows freely. Tanuki's Cave is an essential Auckland experience for anyone who loves authentic, casual Japanese dining.
highlights: Auckland's most iconic underground izakaya since 1994
Classic smoky yakitori grilled over charcoal
Extensive sake and Japanese whisky list
Authentic Japanese atmosphere unlike anywhere else in Auckland
Open late — perfect for post-show or late-night dining

name: Kazuya
description: Chef Kazuya Yamauchi's eponymous restaurant is one of Auckland's most refined and intimate dining destinations. Located in a discreet Symonds Street space, Kazuya offers a multi-course set menu that masterfully fuses European and Japanese techniques — think slow-roasted meats with Japanese broths, and sashimi with European garnishes. It is frequently cited as one of New Zealand's best restaurants.
highlights: Consistently ranked among New Zealand's top restaurants
Unique European-Japanese fusion multi-course set menu
Intimate, discreet setting for a truly special occasion
Chef Kazuya Yamauchi's personal culinary philosophy
Exceptional local and imported wine and sake pairing

name: Tanpopo Ramen
description: Tanpopo is Auckland's longest-running and most iconic ramen house, serving steaming bowls of authentic tonkotsu shoyu ramen on Anzac Ave for over three decades. Beloved by students, office workers, and Japanese expats alike, it is the benchmark for no-frills, soul-warming ramen in New Zealand. The rich pork bone broth, simmered for hours, is the star of every bowl.
highlights: Auckland's most iconic ramen restaurant for over 30 years
Classic tonkotsu shoyu ramen with rich, slow-simmered broth
Highly affordable pricing for CBD dining
Quick service ideal for lunch breaks
Beloved by Japanese expats for its authentic flavours

name: IPPUDO Newmarket
description: The Auckland outpost of the world-famous Hakata ramen chain, IPPUDO Newmarket brings an energetic, fast-paced atmosphere and bowls of their signature Shiromaru Motoaji tonkotsu ramen. Diners can customize noodle firmness, richness, and toppings to their preference. Beyond ramen, the menu includes excellent karaage chicken, steamed buns, and seasonal specials.
highlights: World-famous Hakata tonkotsu ramen chain
Signature Shiromaru Motoaji broth simmered for 18 hours
Customizable noodle firmness and broth richness
Excellent side dishes including steamed buns and karaage
Vibrant energy and quick, efficient service

name: Kureta
description: Located within the JW Marriott Auckland, Kureta offers a refined teppanyaki and omakase experience that blends elemental Japanese cooking with New Zealand's finest produce. The dramatic open kitchen, where chefs perform with precision and flair on the hot iron plate, provides a theatrical dining experience that is both intimate and celebratory. The dedicated sake sommelier curates pairings that elevate every course.
highlights: Exclusive omakase teppanyaki experience in the JW Marriott
Dramatic live cooking performance on the iron plate
Dedicated sake sommelier for bespoke drink pairings
Premium New Zealand produce meets Japanese precision
Elegant, intimate setting ideal for celebrations

name: Qualified Building Solutions (QBS)
description: Qualified Building Solutions (QBS) is a Registered Master Builder specialising in complex architectural designs, heritage villa renovations, and high-end residential new builds across Central Auckland. Founded on precision craftsmanship and clear communication, QBS has built a reputation for delivering projects that meet the exacting standards of Auckland's most discerning homeowners and architects.
highlights: Registered Master Builder with 10-Year Master Build Guarantee
Specialist in heritage villa restoration and character homes
Complex architectural builds including multi-level and sloping sites
Licensed Building Practitioner (LBP) with full insurance
Trusted by Auckland's top residential architects

name: Build Firm
description: Build Firm is a full-service residential construction company based on Auckland's North Shore, specialising in high-end new builds and modern architectural homes. Their design-to-build approach ensures seamless project delivery from initial concept through to handover, with a focus on energy efficiency, quality materials, and contemporary New Zealand living.
highlights: Design-to-build service from concept to completion
Specialising in modern, energy-efficient North Shore homes
Licensed Building Practitioner with comprehensive insurance
Transparent fixed-price contracts available
Strong relationships with leading Auckland architects

name: Cain Built
description: Cain Built is a West Auckland builder delivering energy-efficient new builds, thoughtful home extensions, and quality renovations backed by the 10-Year Master Build Guarantee. Their team prioritises sustainable building practices and low-maintenance materials, making them a popular choice for families looking for long-term value and comfort.
highlights: 10-Year Master Build Guarantee on all new residential builds
Focus on energy-efficient and sustainable construction
Expert in West Auckland terrain and council requirements
Extensions and renovations that blend seamlessly with existing homes
Clear, honest communication throughout the project

name: Radford Builders
description: Radford Builders delivers high-quality home renovations, extensions, and bespoke new builds across Central Auckland and the Rodney region. Known for meticulous attention to detail and proactive communication, they bring a personal, owner-operator approach to every project — ensuring the principal builder is on-site and accessible throughout the entire build process.
highlights: Owner-operator model — principal builder on-site daily
Specialising in premium renovations and extensions
Excellent track record across Central Auckland and Rodney
Licensed Building Practitioner with full project insurance
Proactive communication with weekly progress updates

name: NZ Force Construction
description: NZ Force Construction services both residential and commercial projects across the wider Auckland region. With a reputation built on honest communication, transparent quoting, and reliable workmanship, they handle everything from ground-up new builds and multi-unit developments to office fit-outs and commercial refurbishments.
highlights: Residential and commercial building expertise
Transparent quoting with no hidden costs
Multi-unit development and subdivision capability
Strong subcontractor network across all Auckland zones
Honest, proactive communication from quote to handover

name: Tatsushi
description: Authentic Japanese dining experience focusing on fresh, seasonal ingredients and traditional techniques. Famous for its sashimi and warm hospitality.

name: Kazaguruma Japanese Dining
description: Premium contemporary Japanese dining offering an exquisite Omakase experience and refined seasonal dishes in the heart of Cuba Street.

name: Miyabi
description: A Wellington institution known for its traditional Japanese flavors, cozy atmosphere, and consistent quality since 1997.

name: Origami
description: Creative Japanese fusion restaurant and patisserie, serving unique sushi rolls, ramen, and exquisite handmade desserts.

name: Yoshi Sushi & Bento
description: Modern and fresh Japanese eatery specializing in high-quality sushi rolls, bento boxes, and vibrant Japanese street food.

name: Response Plumbing Ltd
description: Response Plumbing Ltd is a locally owned and operated team specializing in prompt, professional plumbing solutions across the Auckland region. From 24/7 emergency leak repairs to complex bathroom renovations, they are known for their upfront pricing, high standards of workmanship, and exceptional communication. Every technician is a registered professional, ensuring your home or business is in safe hands.
highlights: No call-out fee during standard business hours
24/7 emergency plumbing and gasfitting support
Specialists in leak detection and burst pipe repairs
Registered Master Plumbers with full insurance
Guaranteed same-day service for urgent plumbing issues

name: Matthews Plumbing And Gasfitting
description: With over 25 years of experience, Matthews Plumbing And Gasfitting provides reliable, high-standard services to North Shore and Central Auckland residents. They specialize in gas water heating, kitchen and bathroom renovations, and general maintenance, with a strong reputation for maintaining clean workspaces and providing honest, helpful advice.
highlights: Specialists in gas continuous flow water heating
Highly experienced in high-end bathroom renovations
Dedicated preventive maintenance for landlords
Clean, professional, and punctual technicians
Full Master Plumbers workmanship guarantee

name: Plumbquick Auckland
description: Plumbquick is Auckland's go-to specialist for 24/7 emergency plumbing and drainage. Their large fleet ensures rapid response times for hot water failures, burst pipes, and sewer backups across the entire Super City. They combine technical expertise with transparent pricing and a focus on getting the job done right the first time.
highlights: Guaranteed 24/7 emergency response anywhere in Auckland
Experts in solar and commercial hot water systems
CCTV drain inspections and hydro-jetting specialists
Large-scale commercial maintenance services
Upfront pricing with detailed electronic invoicing

name: Pipe Fix Plumbing
description: Pipe Fix Plumbing is a boutique West Auckland firm specializing in high-quality bathroom and kitchen renovations. Led by master plumbers, the team is dedicated to providing dependable workmanship, clear communication, and personalized service for homeowners across the western suburbs.
highlights: Small, dedicated team focusing on detail-oriented projects
Specialists in modern kitchen and bathroom overhauls
Friendly, local West Auckland service focus
Direct communication with the head master plumber
All work documented and fully guaranteed

name: Auckland Plumbers Group
description: Auckland Plumbers Group provides a full suite of plumbing, gasfitting, and drainage services for both residential and commercial clients. As Registered Master Plumbers, they bring a high level of accountability and technical proficiency to every project, ranging from leaking taps to complex multi-unit developments.
highlights: Full-service plumbing, gasfitting, and drainlaying team
Professional commercial maintenance contracts available
Dedicated hot water cylinder repair and install team
Highly stable team of long-serving master tradespeople
Transparent 'No Surprises' fixed pricing for standard work

name: Tapit Plumbing
description: Tapit Plumbing is a family-owned Auckland business known for combining traditional values with modern efficiency. They provide a comprehensive range of plumbing and gas services, focusing on providing Aucklanders with fast, reliable response times and high-quality results. Whether it is a small repair or a large installation, Tapit delivers with a focus on durability and customer satisfaction.
highlights: Proudly family-owned and operated for over 15 years
Experts in residential and commercial drainage and unblocking
Reliable 24/7 service for urgent repairs across the CBD and South
Competitive hourly rates and upfront pricing
Highly rated for clean workspace management and professionalism

name: Eagle Plumbing
description: Eagle Plumbing is a highly respected Auckland firm providing technical excellence in plumbing, gasfitting, and roofing. Known for their meticulous attention to detail and ability to handle complex technical challenges, they are a preferred choice for residential homeowners and commercial property managers seeking reliable long-term solutions.
highlights: Exceptional technical expertise in complex plumbing systems
Integrated plumbing, gasfitting, and roofing services
Auckland-based team with extensive local building knowledge
Preferred for high-end residential and commercial builds
Outstanding track record for punctuality and reliability

name: Call A Plumber NZ
description: Call A Plumber NZ is one of Auckland's most highly-reviewed plumbing companies, specializing in high-speed service and modern leak detection technology. They offer a comprehensive 24/7 service for residential emergencies, hot water cylinder replacements, and drain unblocking, with a strong commitment to transparency and fixed-price outcomes.
highlights: Over 300 five-star Google reviews from Aucklanders
Auckland specialists in smart leak detection and prevention
Guaranteed 1-hour response for critical emergency plumbing
Fixed-price quotes provided for every job before work starts
Experts in modern efficient hot water system upgrades

name: Grace Plumbing
description: Grace Plumbing is known for its graceful handling of both small home repairs and large commercial plumbing challenges. Based in Central Auckland, they focus on providing cost-effective, durable solutions with a high degree of transparency and professionalism. They are a top choice for apartment dwellers and property managers seeking efficient maintenance.
highlights: Auckland CBD specialists for high-density apartment plumbing
Transparent upfront pricing with low call-out fees
Efficient and professional general plumbing maintenance
Highly rated for clear and honest technical advice
EWRB and Master Plumber registered for full peace of mind

name: Eco Plumber

name: Kingfisher Plumbing
description: Exceptional customer experience with upfront pricing and quick response for all plumbing emergencies.

name: Grammar Electrical
description: Grammar Electrical is one of Auckland's most established electrical service providers, offering premium 24-hour support across the Super City. Known for their punctuality and expert troubleshooting, they specialize in everything from complex industrial repairs to high-end residential installations and maintenance.
highlights: 24/7 emergency electrical service across Auckland
Over 75 years of combined industry experience
Specialists in both residential and industrial electrical
EWRB registered and fully insured team
Guaranteed response times for urgent call-outs

description: Highly reliable and efficient electrical solutions for residential and commercial projects in the Capital.

description: Specialists in new builds, switchboard upgrades, and heat pump installations with a focus on safety.

description: Total electrical solutions including home automation, solar panel setups, and general repairs.

name: Affordable Electrical
description: Trusted for over 50 years, providing honest advice and quality electrical workmanship across the Bay.

name: Amps Electrical Ltd
description: Amps Electrical is a North Shore-based team providing guaranteed quality and safety-focused solutions. They are experts in residential renovations, switchboard upgrades, and large-scale commercial electrical infrastructure projects throughout Auckland.
highlights: Specialists in residential kitchen and bathroom renovations
Extensive experience in commercial electrical fit-outs
Master Electricians workmanship guarantee
Detailed and transparent upfront quoting

name: The Thorne Group
description: Award-winning architectural renovation specialists with over 15 years of experience transforming Tauranga homes. The Thorne Group excels in large-scale extensions, complete home renovations, and high-spec kitchen and bathroom overhauls across the Bay of Plenty, delivering fixed-price contracts with a 10-year Master Build Guarantee.

name: Straight Up Builders
description: Reliable Tauranga renovation builders known for quality workmanship, clear communication, and honest fixed-price quotes. Specialists in kitchen renovations, bathroom makeovers, and home extensions across Tauranga, Mount Maunganui, and Papamoa with a focus on on-time delivery.

description: Meticulous brewing and innovative pour-over methods in the CBD.

name: Park Hyatt Auckland
description: Auckland's premier luxury waterfront hotel featuring stunning harbor views, world-class dining, and a rooftop pool. Located at the iconic Viaduct Harbour.

name: The Hotel Britomart
description: Boutique luxury in a heritage-listed building. Sustainability-focused design with locally curated interiors and Kingi restaurant serving the best of NZ produce.

name: Sofitel Auckland Viaduct Harbour
description: French elegance meets New Zealand hospitality. Waterfront luxury with marina views, signature spa treatments, and refined dining at Lava Dining.

name: Sofitel Wellington
description: French-inspired 5-star luxury in the heart of the capital. Designer rooms, garden oasis, and the acclaimed Hippopotamus Restaurant for fine dining.

name: InterContinental Wellington
description: Elegant sophistication steps from Lambton Quay. Premium bedding, club lounge access, indoor pool, spa, and award-winning dining experiences.

name: QT Wellington
description: Bold, artistic boutique hotel with distinctive design and quirky interiors. Two eateries, a bustling bar, and unmistakable Wellington character.

name: The George
description: Prestigious 5-star boutique hotel with a legendary 1:1 staff-to-guest ratio. Overlooking Hagley Park with award-winning 50 Bistro and Pescatore restaurants.

name: The Observatory Hotel
description: Historic grandeur meets modern luxury in this palatial heritage building. Antique-furnished rooms, buffet breakfast, and central city convenience.

name: Novotel Tainui Hamilton
description: Premium riverside hotel with sleek, spacious rooms and stunning Waikato River views. Acclaimed buffet breakfast and modern fitness facilities.

name: Distinction Hamilton Hotel
description: Four-star accommodation with well-equipped gym and conference facilities. Popular choice for business travelers and events in the Waikato region.

name: The Narrows Landing
description: Charming boutique B&B with quirky stained glass features, in-room spa baths, and gourmet continental breakfasts. Perfect for romantic getaways and weddings.

name: Trinity Wharf Tauranga

name: Hotel on Devonport
description: Stylish central Tauranga hotel with modern rooms and excellent views. Popular choice for both business and leisure travelers in the Bay of Plenty.

name: Oceanside Resort & Twin Towers
description: Mount Maunganui beachfront resort with two swimming pools. Steps from Mauao and the famous beach, offering apartments with stunning ocean views.

name: Ahi
description: Award-winning 3-Hat restaurant celebrating New Zealand cuisine. Chef Ben Bayly's innovative menu features organic, locally-sourced ingredients with iconic dishes like the Scampi Corn Dog.

name: The Grove
description: Exquisite modern New Zealand fine dining in a relaxed yet sophisticated atmosphere. Winner of multiple Metro Restaurant of the Year awards.
address: St Patrick's Square, Wyndham Street, Auckland CBD

name: Cassia
description: Modern Indian fine dining with an exciting twist on traditional dishes. Plush interiors and a mouth-watering menu featuring signature roasted carrot with vindaloo.

name: Logan Brown
description: Wellington icon since 1996, renowned for precision fine dining and the legendary pāua ravioli. Set in a stunning heritage building with impeccable service.

name: Hippopotamus
description: Luxurious French fine dining at Sofitel Wellington. Classic techniques with a modern NZ twist, stunning city views, and Two Hat recognition from Cuisine Magazine.

name: Graze
description: Outstanding Restaurant at Welly Hospo Awards 2024. Lively Kelburn spot serving produce-led small plates with sustainability at its core.

name: Inati
description: Canterbury's Outstanding Restaurant winner. Intimate chef's table experience with personalized tasting plates featuring premium Canterbury-sourced ingredients.

name: Twenty Seven Steps
description: Elegant European fare in a heritage terrace setting. Bold, seasonal flavors reflecting Canterbury's micro-seasons with an intimate, romantic atmosphere.

name: Bessie
description: Sophisticated steakhouse specializing in high-quality dry-aged meats cooked in a charcoal oven. Open kitchen concept with a focus on exceptional cuts.

name: Palate Restaurant
description: Award-winning modern New Zealand cuisine at SkyCity Hamilton. Custom-built open-fire grill, locally sourced seasonal produce, and an extensive wine list.

name: Chim Choo Ree
description: Award-winning innovative cuisine with impeccable service. Classy indoor and outdoor seating, featuring a celebrated six-course tasting menu.

name: Gothenburg
description: Global tapas with panoramic Waikato River views. Light-filled space showcasing the best of the Waikato region with options for al fresco dining.

name: Harbourside
description: Stunning waterfront fine dining on The Strand. Focus on fresh seafood and local produce with panoramic harbour views. Perfect for special occasions.

name: Fife Lane
description: Sophisticated Mount Maunganui gem named among World's 101 Best Steak Restaurants 2023. Modern NZ cuisine with chic ambiance and legendary Beef Wellington.

name: Smith & Sons Tauranga
description: Full-service renovation builders guiding Tauranga homeowners through the entire renovation journey — from initial design concepts to final completion. Smith & Sons specialise in bathroom and kitchen updates, new decks, room additions, and complete home refurbishments with a national support network and local Bay of Plenty expertise.

name: Built Construction Tauranga
description: Recognised by locals for making the renovation process easy and enjoyable. Built Construction creates personalised renovation plans for kitchen upgrades, full house renovations, and modern extensions. Their hands-on approach, attention to detail, and commitment to quality craftsmanship has earned them a loyal following across the Bay of Plenty.

name: Kleen Car Wash & Detailing
description: Premium hand car wash and full detailing service in Newmarket. Eco-friendly products, ceramic coating specialists, and express wash options. Auckland's top-reviewed car care destination.

name: Diamond Hand Car Wash
description: Trusted express and premium car wash on the North Shore. Interior detailing, paint correction, and fleet wash services available. Consistently rated Auckland's friendliest car wash team.

name: Smith & Smith Panel & Paint
description: Insurance-approved collision repair specialists with locations across Auckland. Factory-certified for major brands, computerised colour matching, and courtesy cars available. Over 25 years of trusted service.

name: Collision Repair Associates
description: Precision panel and paint specialists on the North Shore. MTA-certified with expertise in European, Japanese, and luxury vehicle repairs. Free assessments and insurance liaison.

name: Beaurepaires Auckland Central
description: One of Auckland's most trusted tyre retailers with multiple locations. Stocking Bridgestone, Firestone, and budget brands. Wheel alignments, balancing, and fleet services available.

name: Tony's Tyres & Auto Care
description: Family-owned tyre specialists serving Auckland since 1985. Competitive pricing on all major brands, same-day fitting, and expert advice. Known for honest service and going the extra mile.

name: Giltrap Group
description: New Zealand's premier luxury car dealer group representing Audi, Porsche, Lamborghini, Bentley, and McLaren. Multiple award-winning showrooms in Newmarket and Grey Lynn with exceptional after-sales service.

name: S&S Auto Electrical & Mechanical
description: AA-approved workshop specialising in European and Japanese vehicle servicing, WoF inspections, and complex diagnostics. Transparent pricing, honest advice, and a loyal customer following across Central Auckland.

name: Barilla Dumpling
description: Barilla Dumpling is a Dominion Road institution and one of Auckland's most talked-about Chinese restaurants. Famous for its hand-pulled noodles made fresh before your eyes and perfectly crispy pan-fried dumplings (guotie), it serves authentic Northern Chinese cuisine in a bustling, no-frills atmosphere that transports you straight to a Beijing side street. The queue is long, the tables are shared, and the food is outstanding.
highlights: Auckland's most famous dumpling restaurant on Dominion Road
Hand-pulled noodles made fresh in front of you
Perfectly crispy pan-fried guotie dumplings
BYO with no corkage — outstanding value
Consistently ranked among Auckland's best Chinese restaurants

name: Grand Park Chinese Seafood Restaurant
description: Under the same ownership as Grand Harbour, Grand Park delivers premium Cantonese dining and outstanding yum cha in Greenlane. With live seafood tanks, a vast dim sum selection, and banquet facilities for large groups, it serves as the go-to destination for Auckland's Cantonese community south of the CBD. The quality and authenticity match the Viaduct flagship, with easier parking and shorter weekend queues.
highlights: Sister restaurant to Grand Harbour with matching quality
Live seafood tanks and extensive yum cha menu
Banquet facilities ideal for large family celebrations
Easier parking and shorter queues than the Viaduct location
Trusted destination for Auckland's Cantonese community

name: Hotpot Duke
description: Hotpot Duke is Dominion Road's premier hotpot destination, offering an elevated communal dining experience where you select from a variety of rich broths — including a fiery málà and a nourishing bone marrow — and cook premium meats, seafood, and vegetables tableside. The quality of the ingredients, particularly the thinly-sliced wagyu and handmade fish balls, sets it apart from other Auckland hotpot restaurants.
highlights: Dominion Road's top-rated hotpot destination
Multiple broth options including málà and bone marrow
Premium thinly-sliced wagyu and handmade fish balls
Communal, interactive dining experience
All-you-can-eat option available for excellent value

name: Spicy House
description: Spicy House is a no-frills Dominion Road favourite for authentic Sichuan cuisine at unbeatable prices. The kitchen specialises in bold, peppercorn-laden classics — from fiery chicken with fresh chilli and numbing mapo tofu to hot-and-spicy dry beef. It's the kind of place where the laminated menu runs to four pages, the chilli oil flows freely, and every dish delivers the authentic málà punch that Sichuan food lovers crave.
highlights: Authentic Sichuan cooking with genuine málà flavour
Unbeatable value — generous portions at low prices
BYO with no corkage fee
Famous for mapo tofu and chicken with fresh chilli
Dominion Road favourite for spice enthusiasts

name: Sun World Seafood Restaurant
description: Sun World in Newmarket is one of Auckland's most reliable destinations for Cantonese seafood and yum cha. The restaurant offers a vast dim sum selection during weekend lunch service, alongside excellent live seafood dishes — particularly their XO sauce rice noodles and salt-and-pepper squid. A perennial favourite with Newmarket shoppers and the local Chinese community alike.
highlights: Excellent weekend yum cha with wide dim sum selection
Live seafood specialists — crab, lobster, and fish
Famous XO sauce rice noodles and salt-and-pepper squid
Convenient Newmarket location near shopping
Popular with local Chinese community for authentic flavour

name: Tai Er Sichuan Cuisine
description: Tai Er is a massively popular Chinese chain that recently opened its first New Zealand location on Lorne Street in Auckland CBD — and the queues have been steady since day one. Famous across China for its signature suancai fish (pickled cabbage and fish in broth), the restaurant offers bold, customizable Sichuan flavours in a sleek, modern setting. It brings a taste of contemporary Chinese urban dining culture to Auckland.
highlights: First New Zealand location of the hugely popular Chinese chain
Signature suancai fish with customizable spice level
Sleek, contemporary interior with urban Chinese vibe
Bold Sichuan flavours in the heart of the CBD
Well-known brand trusted across China and Southeast Asia

name: Paradise Indian Restaurant
description: Multi-award-winning Indian restaurant in Sandringham with over 35 years of serving authentic North and South Indian cuisine. Famous for biryanis, tandoori specials, and generous vegetarian options.

name: Prego
description: Iconic Ponsonby Road Italian restaurant and one of Auckland's longest-running dining institutions. Beloved for its buzzing atmosphere, wood-fired pizzas, handmade pasta, and exceptional wine list spanning 30+ years.

name: Thai Street
description: Vibrant Auckland CBD Thai eatery bringing authentic Bangkok street food flavours to New Zealand. Pad see ew, green curry, and mango sticky rice prepared by Thai-born chefs using imported ingredients.

name: Clooney
description: One of Auckland's most acclaimed fine dining restaurants blending French technique with New Zealand produce. Multi-award-winning chef-driven tasting menus, an exceptional wine programme, and sophisticated Freemans Bay setting.

name: My House Renovation
description: End-to-end Auckland renovation specialists covering kitchen makeovers, bathroom renovations, and full home transformations. Known for transparent fixed-price contracts, detailed 3D design renders, and a Master Builder 10-year guarantee.

name: Karori Car Wash & Grooming
description: Wellington's trusted hand car wash and detailing studio. Eco-friendly products, interior grooming, and ceramic coating specialists. Convenient Karori location with express and premium options.

name: Prestige Auto Detail Wellington
description: Premium mobile car detailing service covering all Wellington suburbs. Paint correction, ceramic coating, and leather restoration by certified technicians. Wellington's highest-rated detailing service.

name: Miramar Auto Centre
description: AA-approved workshop in Miramar specialising in Japanese and European vehicle servicing, WoF inspections, and diagnostics. Family-owned with over 20 years of trusted service to Wellington's eastern suburbs.

name: Capital Automotive
description: MTA-certified mechanics in Petone offering comprehensive vehicle servicing, cam belt replacements, brake repairs, and pre-purchase inspections. Known for honest pricing and clear communication.

name: Wellington Tyre Centre
description: Wellington's independent tyre specialists stocking Michelin, Continental, Bridgestone, and budget brands. Expert advice for Wellington's hilly terrain, computerised alignments, and same-day fitting. Serving the capital for over 15 years.

name: Hutt City Tyres
description: Lower Hutt's most trusted tyre shop with competitive pricing on all brands. Wheel alignments, balancing, and fleet services. Free tyre checks and honest advice from experienced staff.

name: Wellington Motors
description: Award-winning multi-franchise dealership on Hutt Road representing Toyota, Honda, and Mazda. New and certified pre-owned vehicles with competitive finance, comprehensive warranties, and exceptional after-sales service.

name: Capital Panel & Paint
description: Insurance-approved collision repair centre in Ngauranga. I-CAR Gold certified technicians, computerised colour matching, and all-brand expertise. Courtesy cars available and direct insurance billing for all major providers.

name: Dragon Restaurant
description: Wellington institution on Courtenay Place serving authentic Cantonese cuisine and yum cha since 1978. Famous weekend dim sum trolley service, fresh seafood, and classic Chinese banquet menus in the heart of the capital's dining precinct.

name: KC Café & Restaurant
description: Modern Chinese restaurant in the CBD mixing traditional flavours with contemporary Wellington flair. Sichuan specials, hand-made dumplings, and late-night dining. Popular with the after-work crowd and theatre-goers.

name: Le Canard
description: Intimate French bistro in Thorndon offering classic Gallic cuisine with seasonal New Zealand produce. Duck confit, coq au vin, and an outstanding French wine list in a charming heritage setting. Wellington's most authentic French dining experience.

name: Brasserie Le Quartier
description: Sophisticated French-New Zealand brasserie on the waterfront. Weekend brunch, evening tasting menus, and artisan charcuterie. Award-winning wine programme featuring Wellington's best selection of French and local wines.

name: Thai Chef Restaurant
description: Award-winning Thai restaurant on Cuba Street run by Thai-born chef. Authentic green curry, massaman, and pad thai using imported herbs and spices. BYO wine option and generous portions. Wellington's favourite Thai for over 15 years.

name: Monsoon Poon
description: Iconic Wellington institution blending Thai, Malaysian, and Southeast Asian flavours in a vibrant Blair Street setting. Legendary lunchtime curries, creative cocktails, and one of the capital's most buzzing atmospheres.

name: The Great India Restaurant
description: Wellington's most acclaimed fine-dining Indian restaurant on Courtenay Place. Modern interpretations of North and South Indian cuisine using premium NZ ingredients. Extensive tandoori menu, craft cocktail pairings, and award-winning service.

name: Scopa
description: Award-winning Italian restaurant on Cuba Street with handmade pasta, wood-fired pizzas, and an all-Italian wine list. Chef-owner trained in Rome, delivering some of Wellington's most authentic and creative Italian cuisine in a warm, bustling atmosphere.

name: Hawthorn Lounge
description: Award-winning cocktail bar hidden down a Tory Street laneway. Bespoke cocktails, vintage spirits, and an intimate speakeasy atmosphere. Regularly named among New Zealand's best bars. Perfect for a sophisticated Wellington evening.

name: San Fran
description: Iconic Cuba Street live music venue and late-night club. Two levels of entertainment — intimate gigs upstairs and a pumping dance floor below. Hosting Wellington's best DJs and touring acts for over a decade.

name: BDO Wellington
description: Full-service accounting and advisory firm in the Wellington CBD. Specialists in government contracting, SME advisory, tax planning, and audit services. Proactive, tech-savvy approach with Xero and cloud accounting expertise.

name: Gibson Sheat Lawyers
description: Established Wellington law firm with offices in the CBD and Lower Hutt. Comprehensive services including property conveyancing, family law, employment, estates, and commercial law. Known for personal service, clear communication, and strong community ties.

name: Tommy's Real Estate Wellington
description: Wellington's leading independent real estate agency with deep local knowledge across the capital region. Specialists in Mount Victoria, Thorndon, Karori, and the Hutt Valley. Award-winning marketing, proven sales results, and a trusted name for over 20 years.

name: Refresh Renovations Wellington Central
description: Fully-managed Wellington renovation service covering kitchens, bathrooms, full home renovations, and earthquake-strengthening projects. Single point of contact, fixed-price contracts, and a proven design-to-build process tailored to Wellington's unique building environment.
